name: @equistamp/equistamp
description: A TypeScript library for interacting with equistamp.com

scripts.lint: yarn workspaces run tsc && yarn prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.lint:fix: yarn workspaces run tsc && npm run prettier:fix && npm run eslint:fix
scripts.patch-bump: yarn workspaces run yarn version --no-git-tag-version --new-version patch && yarn version --new-version patch
scripts.minor-bump: yarn workspaces run yarn version --no-git-tag-version --new-version minor && yarn version --new-version minor
scripts.major-bump: yarn workspaces run yarn version --no-git-tag-version --new-version major && yarn version --new-version major

author: Equistamp
